name: RHINOTRON
description:
Our submission for the 14. ZFX-Action game jam: ZFX-Action XIV

Try to get high scores by blasting alien skyscrapers with your laser and collecting power ups while avoiding enemy bullets.

Use cursor left/right and space to control or alternatively a controller of your choice.
